HotelElement.Name: Courtyard by Marriott Nashville Vanderbilt/West End

Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Courtyard By Marriott Vanderbilt-West End places you in the heart of Nashville, steps from Local Color Gallery and close to Upper Room. This family-friendly hotel is within close proximity of Hartzler-Towner Multicultural Museum and Car Collector's Hall of Fame.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 226 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and LCD televisions. Your pillowtop bed comes with Egyptian cotton sheets. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature designer toiletries and complimentary toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don’t miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including an outdoor pool, a 24-hour fitness center, and a seasonal outdoor pool. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access and a picnic area. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the complimentary area shuttle.

Dining
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Courtyard By Marriott Vanderbilt-West End, or find a snack in a coffee shop/café. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a business center, and express check-in. Planning an event in Nashville? This hotel has facilities measuring 1500 square feet (139 square meters), including meeting rooms. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Courtyard By Marriott Vanderbilt-West End, or find a snack in a coffee shop/café. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

The preferred airport for Courtyard By Marriott Vanderbilt-West End is Nashville, TN (BNA-Nashville Intl.) - 11.8 km / 7.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
